snippet: Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom, a former mayor of San Francisco, said Wednesday that he would begin raising money to run for governor in 2018, a position he has long sought.
abstract: California Lt Gov Gavin Newsom, a former mayor of San Francisco, says he will start raising money to run for governor in 2018, a position he has long sought.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom, a former mayor of San Francisco, said Wednesday that he would begin raising money to run for governor in 2018, a position he has long sought.

headline.main: California: Lieutenant Governor Raising Money to Succeed Brown
headline.print_headline: California: Lieutenant Governor Raising Money to Succeed Brown
